add_alignment(aln)[source]¶

Adds a label to the list of channel 1 labels

check_containment()[source]¶

Parses the list of alignments in search of alignments that could be contained into another one, i.e. reference_start_aln_1 < reference_start_aln_2 and reference_end_aln_1 > reference_end_aln_2

Returns

List of tuples containing the contained alignment at the second position and the alignment containing it at the first position

Return type

list(tuple(Alignment, Alignment))

get_label_position(label_id, channel)[source]¶

Returns a label position on a map based on its id and channel

Parameters

  • label_id (integer) – Label id to look for

  • channel (int) – Enzyme channel of the searched label

Raises

Exception – If the label couldn’t be found

Returns

Searched label position

Return type

int
